metadata.title: CVE-2021-39886 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Permissions rules were not applied while issues were moved between projectsof the same group in GitLab versions starting with 10.6 and up to 14.1.7allowing users to read confidential Epic references.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
